main.headline: A boilerplate for Twig projects
main.text:
An Atomic Web Design boilerplate for rapid prototyping of reusable components. Read more on it on Github

Twig has a very good documentation. You should give it a try: Twig - Introduction

An example – buttons ;)

Here are examples from a single button component. Sometimes, buttons and anchors should visually not be distinguished, but technically they're completely different elements. It's configurable by simply passing parameters to the button component.
main.text2:
Another example – form elements

All these form elements live in the same component and can be released by simply passing a parameter.

footer.text: Made with ♥ by @Freizeitler
